data.lyric:
[ti:King Of My City]
[ar:A Boogie Wit Da Hoodie]
[al:King Of My City]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]King Of My City (Explicit) - A Boogie Wit Da Hoodie
[00:13.74]Yeah
[00:14.85]I'm from the Bronx not Benny
[00:16.89]I swear I don't even know why I did it
[00:19.08]AP cost a hunnid and fifty
[00:20.99]I be feeling like I'm drowning with it
[00:22.75]Drowning with it
[00:22.95]He be trying to ride the wave
[00:24.35]You should be afraid that you don't drown in it
[00:27.18]I be feeling like the king of my city
[00:29.00]From the Bronx not Benny yeah yeah
[00:30.98]500K that's just on the Richie
[00:32.99]My n***a you don't wanna play with my city
[00:34.96]N***as die everyday in my city
[00:37.07]Whole lotta young wild n***as
[00:38.93]He be trying to ride the wave
[00:40.33]You should be afraid that you might drown in it
[00:43.08]I be feeling like the king of my city
[00:44.77]And every n***a with me wearing Amiri
[00:47.10]Headshot like POW n***a
[00:49.24]Headshot like pow n***ga
[00:51.00]Hit him twice make sure you don't miss him
[00:52.81]Them bullets in this pistol look like a missile
[00:55.16]Headshot like POW n***a
[00:57.13]Hit 'em up and down n***a
[00:59.06]Send a n***a on a motherf**king mission
[01:00.85]It's f**ked up yeah I know they gone miss him
[01:03.12]I am not with it yeah
[01:04.96]Try to play with me you might end up missing
[01:07.01]VVSs Elliot not missing
[01:09.10]Sorry miss these Elliot VVSs
[01:11.07]Long johns on just for the Crips
[01:13.06]Long johns on Crip we're tuckin'
[01:15.09]If you gotta pay the bills f**k it
[01:17.19]West side n***a
[01:18.06]From the Bronx yeah
[01:19.03]Throw it up like LeBron yeah
[01:21.11]30 rounds on 100 and friends
[01:23.09]All my guys came with the s**ts
[01:25.04]And then we might get to bussin' yeah
[01:27.06]If I like your necklace yeah
[01:28.99]Those guys might take off your necklace
[01:31.00]F**k a fight I ain't with the tech and
[01:33.05]Those guys might want you to check in
[01:34.89]I'm from the Bronx not Benny
[01:36.64]Yeah
[01:36.96]I swear I don't even know why I did it
[01:39.10]AP cost a hunnid and fifty
[01:41.05]I be feeling like I'm drowning with it
[01:43.04]He be trying to ride the wave
[01:44.32]You should be afraid that you don't drown in it
[01:47.08]I be feeling like the king of my city
[01:49.02]From the Bronx not Benny
[01:50.38]Yeah yeah
[01:51.03]500K that's just on the Richie
[01:52.86]My n***a you don't wanna play with my city
[01:55.12]N***as die everyday in my city
[01:57.05]Whole lotta young wild n***gas
[01:59.10]He be trying to ride the wave
[02:00.38]You should be afraid that you might drown in it
[02:03.08]I be feeling like the king of my city
[02:04.90]And every n***a with me wearing Amiri
data.trans:
[ti:King Of My City]
[ar:A Boogie Wit Da Hoodie]
[al:King Of My City]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:13.74]//
[00:14.85]我来自Bronx 不是Benny
[00:16.89]我发誓 我都不知道为何我成功了
[00:19.08]爱彼手表花了十五万
[00:20.99]感觉我快要不能呼吸
[00:22.75]快要不能呼吸
[00:22.95]他总想利用我的名气
[00:24.35]你应该小心 别偷鸡不成蚀把米
[00:27.18]我感觉自己是我的城市之王
[00:29.00]来自Bronx 不是Benny
[00:30.98]五十万买了一块理查德·米勒手表
[00:32.99]兄弟 你不要想着在我的城市里乱来
[00:34.96]我的城市里 每天都有人死去
[00:37.07]好多放纵不羁的年轻人
[00:38.93]他总想利用我的名气
[00:40.33]你应该小心点 别偷鸡不成蚀把米
[00:43.08]我感觉自己是我的城市之王
[00:44.77]我身边的每个人都穿着Amiri
[00:47.10]一枪命中头部 兄弟
[00:49.24]一枪命中头部 兄弟
[00:51.00]多开一枪 要确保他死透了
[00:52.81]手枪里的子弹看起来就像导弹
[00:55.16]一枪命中头部 兄弟
[00:57.13]扣动扳机 人头落地
[00:59.06]派个兄弟出去执行任务
[01:00.85]完蛋了 我知道他们会很想念他
[01:03.12]我不跟你闹着玩
[01:04.96]要是敢惹我 你可能会人间蒸发
[01:07.01]在Elliot Avianne买高纯度的钻石
[01:09.10]对不起 小姐 这钻石价值连城
[01:11.07]穿上战服 为了瘸帮
[01:13.06]穿上战服 我们无所畏惧
[01:15.09]如果你要付账单 去他的
[01:17.19]西海岸的兄弟
[01:18.06]来自Bronx
[01:19.03]掏枪射击 毫不犹豫
[01:21.11]三十发子弹 弹无虚发
[01:23.09]我的兄弟们个个都有实力
[01:25.04]我们可能会搞一场枪林弹雨
[01:27.06]如果我喜欢你的项链
[01:28.99]这些人可能会抢了你的项链
[01:31.00]一场战斗 无需我亲自动手
[01:33.05]这些人可能会让你尝尝他们的厉害
[01:34.89]我来自Bronx 不是Benny
[01:36.64]//
[01:36.96]我发誓 我都不知道为何我成功了
[01:39.10]爱彼手表花了十五万
[01:41.05]感觉我快要不能呼吸
[01:43.04]他总想利用我的名气
[01:44.32]你应该小心 别偷鸡不成蚀把米
[01:47.08]我感觉自己是我的城市之王
[01:49.02]来自Bronx 不是Benny
[01:50.38]//
[01:51.03]五十万买了一块理查德·米勒手表
[01:52.86]兄弟 你不要想着在我的城市里乱来
[01:55.12]我的城市里 每天都有人死去
[01:57.05]好多放纵不羁的年轻人
[01:59.10]他总想利用我的名气
[02:00.38]你应该小心点 别偷鸡不成蚀把米
[02:03.08]我感觉自己是我的城市之王
[02:04.90]我身边的每个人都穿着Amiri
